1. In the paragraph below, identify the topic sentence (click on the sentence)

â–º Read carefully, you only have one check answer attempt!
data.template: Maintaining student attention in the classroom is a key issue for most university teachers. Students need stimulation if they are to grow as learners. Sharpe (2022) observed an increase in studentsâ€™ ability to focus after they had a break. Similarly, Barnes (2021) discovered that students stayed focused on materials if they worked together. In sum, both methods help students to give their full attention to their studies. Thus, student stimulation seems vital for academic progress.

list: Both sources indicate that wind energy is a smart financial choice.
Ellsmoor (2019) points out that â€˜onshore wind and solar PV power are now, frequently, less expensive than any fossil-fuel option, without financial assistanceâ€™
There are two main advantages of wind energy.
Also, according to Morris (2022), when fuel is converted to electricity, wind energy is 1,164% more efficient than coal which is only 23% efficient.
Wind energy offers a cost-effective, renewable resource which can power communities and bring revenue to the region or country.
Using  wind energy is no longer just an ethical decision, it is also the most profitable one.
